subject: Art & Design
title: Display and Decorative Type
description: Learn Display and Decorative Type in one minute.

hook.text: A horror movie poster in Comic Sans? The font would kill the mood before the movie does.

buildup.text: Display fonts are designed for large sizes: headlines, logos, posters. Never for body text.

discovery.text: Script, blackletter, slab-serif, hand-drawn â€” display types carry extreme personality per letter.

twist.text: The more personality a font has, the faster it becomes annoying. Display fonts have a short shelf life.

climax.text: Use one display font for headlines and pair it with a neutral sans-serif for body. That's the formula.

punchline.text: Display fonts are spices. A pinch adds flavor. A cup ruins the dish.

quiz.question: Why should display fonts not be used for body text?
options: Their strong personality becomes tiring and reduces readability
